ISI.Description: Interval between two-pulse stimuli. Applies only to TWO-PULSE condition

trial_type.Description: Categorical code referring to stimulus condition

Levels.125: TWOPULSE-1 (two pattern stimuli shown for fixed duration, with interval duration 1)
Levels.126: TWOPULSE-2 (two pattern stimuli shown for fixed duration, with interval duration 2)
Levels.127: TWOPULSE-3 (two pattern stimuli shown for fixed duration, with interval duration 3)
Levels.128: TWOPULSE-4 (two pattern stimuli shown for fixed duration, with interval duration 4)
Levels.129: TWOPULSE-5 (two pattern stimuli shown for fixed duration, with interval duration 5)
Levels.130: TWOPULSE-6 (two pattern stimuli shown for fixed duration, with interval duration 6)

trial_name.Description: Description of the stimulus category that was shown during this experiment (see trial_type)

stim_file.Description: Name of the stimulus file that was shown during this trial of the experiment

sample.Description: Stimulus onset in samples relative to the start of the run
